Keyword.Name: Random
Keyword.Description: Generate a random string or number and store it into buffer.xml

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key in buffer file will store value

Param.Description: integer|string|null - combine string and integer

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: ReplaceStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Replace String By String in a file (Images\Utils\1.png)

Param.Name: sSourceFilePath
Param.Description: Source File name need to replace string by string , LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sStringNeedToReplace
Param.Description: String need to find and replace in file

Param.Name: sNewString
Param.Description: New string need to replace string found above

Param.Name: sDestinationFilePath
Param.Description: KW will Save As new file after replace, give your out file

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: ActivateBrowser
Keyword.Description: Activate or Bring Browser to Front of current Webdriver

Param.Name: sWindowHandle
Param.Description: WindowsHandle of browser need to Activate

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Param.Name: sURL
Param.Description: Description(URL will be open)

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: Click Sign In

Keyword.Name: GoToPayablesInvoices
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payables Invoices Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Payables Invoices Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: PayableGoToInbox
Keyword.Description: Payables Invoice - Go to Inbox from Payables Page by clicking on Button Create Inbox

Keyword.Name: DeleteAllMyInvoice
Keyword.Description: Payables Invoices - Delete All My Invoice (Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\DeleteAllMyInvoice.png)

Keyword.Name: GetPreviousCurrentNextDate
Keyword.Description: Get Previous, Current, Next Date and write it in buffer file with key: PreviousDate, CurrentDate, NextDate (Images\Common\3.png)

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CurrentDateMinusHours(12) --> get current date time, then minus with 5 hours, store in buffer with key: CurrentDateMinusHours, CurrentDatePlusHours(12) --> get current date time, then plus with 5 hours, store in buffer with key: CurrentDatePlusHours

Param.Name: sFormat
Param.Description: format of date

Keyword.Name: PayableUploadInvoice
Keyword.Description: Payables Invoices - Upload new invoice and verify after upload, only on tab My Uploads (Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\UploadInvoice.png)

Param.Name: sFileName
Param.Description: Path to file name need to upload

Param.Name: sExpectedResult
Param.Description: Verify upload success or not

Param.Name: sVerifyFileName
Param.Description: Verify file name after upload

Param.Name: sVerifyFileSize
Param.Description: Verify file size after upload

Param.Name: sVerifyUploadDate
Param.Description: Verify file upload date after upload, verify contains

Keyword.Name: SelectInvoice
Keyword.Description: Payables Invoices - Select Invoice In Tab My Uploads or All Uploads (Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\SelectInvoice.png)

Param.Name: sTabName
Param.Description: Tab need to Select Invoice - My Uploads or All Uploads, null means My Uploads

Param.Name: sSearchString
Param.Description: Input String for Search Invoice, can't be null

Param.Name: sVerifyNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of result after search

Param.Name: sSelectOrder
Param.Description: Other of Invoice need to select, null means select first Invoice

Param.Name: sVerifySelectResult
Param.Description: Verify select success or not, in case of Invoice is already used by other user

Keyword.Name: InputAndImportInvoiceData
Keyword.Description: Payables Invoices - Input Invoice Data then Import it (Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\InputAndImportInvoiceData.png)

Param.Name: sField1
Param.Description: Format must have 6 parameters: FieldName;CheckExist;CheckRequired;CheckReadOnly;Value;ErrorMessage - CheckExist = exist or NotExist, CheckRequired = Required or NotRequired, CheckReadOnly = ReadOnly or NotReadOnly, Value = null means by pass input, ErrorMessage = ErrorMessage if any or NotError, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sVerifyTotalAmount
Param.Description: Total Amount need to verify

Param.Name: sVerifyError
Param.Description: Verify Error after input all field about

Param.Name: sClickImport
Param.Description: Click on Import button

Param.Name: sVerifyToastMessage
Param.Description: Toast Message need to verify after click on Import button

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile
Keyword.Description: Query DB then store the table results to a file

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: String query1 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: String query2 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: String query3 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLQueryFile
Param.Description: Execute query from file

Param.Name: sOutputResult2File
Param.Description: Solving the query result then store to a text file, split each of rows to a line, separate each of columns by " || "

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Param.Name: sURL
Param.Description: URL will be open

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Login to AP outsource web page

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: Click Sign In

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to click on Forgot Password, then put FORGOTPASS(true)

Keyword.Name: GoToPayablesInvoices
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payables Invoices Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Payables Invoices Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: SelectAndClickCategory
Keyword.Description: Select an Category

Param.Name: sCategoryName
Param.Description: Name of Category want to select

Param.Name: sTimeExecute
Param.Description: Time after click Work button - For page load

Keyword.Name: FilterTransaction
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on filter button and set filter set (Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\6.png)

Param.Name: sIsListView
Param.Description: Default is Relax Viewed, If you want to change to List View then set sIsListView to true, otherwise null or false

Param.Name: SFieldName
Param.Description: Field name need to filter

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator Equal,

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value Input

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of transaction | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search - cannot input this parameter > 100

Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Log out

Keyword.Name: SelectAndClickOpenTaskButton
Keyword.Description: Select one or Multiple Payable Invoice and click on Work button, this keyword is used after keyword FilterTransaction to make sure just have one transaction in Payable Invoice Page, in case select one Invoices them it'll open the first one results (Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\7.png)

Param.Name: sCategoryName
Param.Description: The name of Category you want to click on

Param.Name: sIsSelectAllTransactions
Param.Description: If you want to select all transactions on Category then set it True, otherwise is False

Param.Name: sIsSelectAllTransactionsGroup
Param.Description: If you want to select all transactions on the same Group then set it True, otherwise is False

Param.Name: sTransactionsGroupName
Param.Description: If sIsSelectAllTransactionsGroup = [True] then you need declare sTransactionsGroupName, otherwise is False

Param.Name: sTimeExecute
Param.Description: Time after click Work button - For page load

Keyword.Name: SelectAndValidateInvoiceBottomSheet
Keyword.Description: Select and open Invoice Bottom, this keyword is used after keyword FilterTransaction to make sure just have one transaction in Payable Invoice Page(Images\Customer\PayablesInvoices\7.png)

Param.Name: sCategoryName
Param.Description: The name of Category you want to click on, null mean bypass, you need to run FilterTransaction to bypass

Param.Name: sVendorNameOrInvoiceNumber
Param.Description: VendorName or InvoiceNumber, If sVendorNameOrInvoiceNumber is null then will open bottom sheet for first transactions

Param.Name: sBottomViewHomeMetaData
Param.Description: Correct value need to check, separate by [;], null mean bypass sInvoiceNumber;sInvoiceDate;sSubTotalAmount;sFreightAmount;sOtherAmount;sDiscountAmount;sTermsDiscountAmount;sTaxAmount;sTotalAmount

Param.Name: sDataTabMetaData
Param.Description: Correct value need to check, separate by [;], null mean bypass sDepartment;sInvoiceDescription;sUdf1;sUdf2;sUdf3;sUdf4;sUdf5

Param.Name: sGLCodingTabbMetaData
Param.Description: No need to input here, if you want to validate GL Coding Tab then set this field is [True] otherwise is null, null mean bypass

Param.Name: sPropertiesTabMetaData
Param.Description: Correct value need to check, separate by [;], null mean bypass sTransactionType;sTransactionID;sTransactionStatus;sDateReceived;sReceivedFrom;sDateImported;sImportedBy;sLastModified;sLastModifiedBy;sExportedOn;sAssignedToTask;sTaskStatus;sTaskDescription

Param.Name: sHistoryTabMetaData
Param.Description: Correct value need to check, separate by [;], null mean bypass

Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Log out

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser
